posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff Lichtman

T204 Ramly (PSA/SGC 5 or better) 
T205 (PSA/SGC 6 or better)


Email me if you'd like to sell any of these, thanks.

Posted By: barrysloate
Jeff- I have an M116 Mordecai Brown(blue) coming up on ebay in a couple of weeks, but it is only a PSA 3. That's half as good as a 6.

Posted By: David R
Jeff,

There's a PSA 6 M116 Brown (pastel) on eBay now.

Posted By: Jeff Lichtman
David, thanks for the headsup on that one -- I was all set to pull the trigger and then I noticed the massive paper loss on the back of the card.  PSA 6?  With not just a dot of paper loss but a whole bunch?  What the hell?  I've never seen such a highly graded PSA card have such damage to the back.  Incredible.

Posted By: Scott Gutwein
Jeff,

I've got a Famous & Barr M101-5 Mordecai Brown available.  It's my last one of the 100 or so that I've sold off.  It's my favorite.  It's in an SGC 40 holder and presents very nice.  No creases or paper loss.  E-mail me at scottg@accessmfgsys.com if you have any interest.

Thanks,
Scott.

Posted By: Peter Thomas
Jeff - I have the same card that you looked at some time ago. It is now in a SGC holder as I crossed over all of my T204 Dups at 2008 National. I sent you an email some time ago - not sure if you received it. - Peter
